Module uk.gov.gchq.eventlogging
Package event.logging.impl

Interface ValidationErrorHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExceptionAndLoggingErrorHandler, LoggingErrorHandler, QuietErrorHandler
    public interface ValidationErrorHandler
extends org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
    An error handler for XML validation. A new instance should be used for each validation.

    Implementations can either re-throw the SAXParseExceptions or silently capture them for later inspection. The latter approach allows for multiple validation problems to be captured rather than failing on the first one.
